contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=May 2012}} '''Jo탑e Ciuha''' is a [[Slovenia]]n artist.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.glas-javnosti.rs/clanak/kultura/glas-javnosti-30-05-2011/joze-ciuha-u-kragujevcu|title=Jo탑e Ciuha u Kragujevcu|date=30 May 2011|work=[[Glas javnosti]]|language=Serbian|accessdate=2 June 2012}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Authority control|VIAF=64229329}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Ciuha, Joze | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ciuha, Joze}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Slovenian painters]] {{Slovenia-painter-stub}}
